name: Luxurious
victoryScreenHeader:
Obtains all luxury resources
to win!
milestones: Build [The Grand Museum of Luxury Resources]
victoryString: You have obtained all the available luxury resources, and you have built 'The Grand Museum of Luxury Resources' to showcase your luxurious superiority to everyone.
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your civilization has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your people do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!
